text: ottakattil ninn rant inakaleyum, pasuvargattil ninn rant inakaleyum(avan srsticcu.) parayuka: (ava rantileyum) anvargannaleyanea, penvargannaleyanea atumalla penvargannalute garbhasayannal ulkeantatineyanea allahu nisid'dhamakkiyittullat‌? alla, allahu ninnaleat iteakke upadesicca sandarbhattin ninnal saksikalayittuntea? appeal oru arivumillate janannale pilappikkan venti allahuvinre peril kallam ketticcamaccavanekkal valiya akrami arunt‌? akramikalaya alukale allahu nervaliyilekk nayikkukayilla; tircca
